values.name: Integrity
values.description: Do the right thing, always. Build trust through honest actions and transparent communication.

values.name: Customer Obsession
values.description: Start with customer needs and work backwards. Earn and keep customer trust.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Invent and simplify. Look for new ideas from everywhere and find ways to simplify.

values.name: Excellence
values.description: Never settle for good enough. Raise the bar with every project and hire the best.

values.name: Collaboration
values.description: Work together to achieve more. Listen, respect, and build on each other's strengths.

values.name: Intellectual Integrity
values.description: Pursue truth over confirmation. Evidence-based decisions, always.

values.name: Strategic Foresight
values.description: Anticipate market shifts early. Lead change, don't follow it.

values.name: Radical Transparency
values.description: Share hard truths directly and kindly. Reality-based planning wins.

values.name: Outcome-Focused Excellence
values.description: Judge by impact delivered, not activity performed. Results drive everything.

values.name: Elegant Simplicity
values.description: Distill complexity into clarity. Deep understanding enables simple solutions.

values.name: Authentic Leadership
values.description: Lead with vulnerability and truth. Strength through self-awareness.

values.name: Bias for Action
values.description: Speed matters. Decide with 70% certainty, adjust as you learn.

values.name: Ownership
values.description: Act on behalf of the entire organization. Never say 'that's not my job.'

values.name: Think Big
values.description: Bold direction inspires results. Think differently and find ways to serve customers.

values.name: Learn and Be Curious
values.description: Never stop learning. Be curious about new possibilities.

values.name: Hire and Develop the Best
values.description: Raise the bar with every hire. Develop leaders and take coaching seriously.

values.name: Insist on Highest Standards
values.description: Leaders have relentlessly high standards. Deliver quality products and services.

values.name: Dive Deep
values.description: Operate at all levels. No task is beneath them. Stay connected to details.

values.name: Have Backbone; Disagree and Commit
values.description: Challenge decisions when you disagree. Once decided, commit fully.

values.name: Deliver Results
values.description: Focus on key inputs and deliver them with the right quality and in a timely fashion.

values.name: Frugality
values.description: Accomplish more with less. Constraints breed resourcefulness and innovation.

values.name: Earn Trust
values.description: Listen attentively, speak candidly, and treat others respectfully.

values.name: Courage
values.description: Make tough decisions. Stand up for what's right even when it's uncomfortable.

values.name: Respect
values.description: Treat everyone with dignity. Value diverse perspectives and experiences.

values.name: Accountability
values.description: Take responsibility for actions and outcomes. Fix problems, not blame.

values.name: Continuous Improvement
values.description: Always look for ways to do better. Embrace feedback and iterate.

values.name: Data-Driven Decision Making
values.description: Let evidence guide choices. Measure what matters and act on insights.

values.name: Customer First
values.description: Put customer needs at the center of every decision.

values.name: Diversity & Inclusion
values.description: Seek and value different perspectives. Build belonging for all.

values.name: Sustainability
values.description: Build for the long term. Balance profit with planet and people.
